word_mean: 偏头痛：常见的家族性综合症状，呈间歇性发作的血管性头痛，初起于单侧颞部，常伴烦燥、恶心、呕吐、便泌、腹泻、羞明
发作前颅脑动脉收缩，引起感觉性先驱(眼)症状，发作后血管扩张
又称“偏头风”。偏于一侧的头部疼痛，往往比较顽固，可能定期发作，常伴有恶心﹑呕吐、眼睛牵扯痛等症。

sentence.Network_en: Other causes of migraine are VDU screens and strip-lighting.
sentence.Network_cn: 偏头痛的其他诱因还有电脑的视频显示器和灯管照明。

sentence.Network_en: These symptoms are particularly associated with migraine headaches.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些症状尤其与偏头痛相关。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French, via late Latin from Greek hēmikrania, from hēmi- 'half' + kranion 'skull'

entry.def: A migraine is an extremely painful headache that makes you feel very ill.

means.word_mean: 1. a severe recurring vascular headache; occurs more frequently in women than men
